Extract zipfile to computer
Copy zipfile\lt_api\* to \xchg_drivers\bcm63xx\zarlink\api_lib
Copy zipfile\api_lib\vp886_api\* to \xchg_drivers\bcm63xx\zarlink\api_lib\vp886_api
Edit lt_api_pkg_sel.h and uncomment #define LT_VP886_VVP_PACKAGE to include support for this SLIC
Edit bcm63xx_zarlink.mk and change the value of XDRV_ZARLINK_TPD_SUPPORT from 0 to 1
Move vp886_testline.h from \xchg_drivers\bcm63xx\zarlink\api_lib\vp886_lt to \xchg_drivers\bcm63xx\zarlink\api_lib\includes
